value.title: DAX Fridays! #10: RANK/ TOPN with slicer
value.excerpt: In this video you will learn how to create a custom slicer that will rank your data based on the criteria that you specify, for example, Top 3, Top 5 and Top 10. value.title: DAX Fridays! #112: Remove blanks from hierarchies with ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you how you can remove blanks from hierarchies using the DAX Function ISINSCOPE.  I have covered ISINSCOPE before with a more difficult example, so I hope this video will explain it in easier terms and with a useful example.  Link to the previous ISINSCOPE video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sSUCyps_1O4

value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI
value.excerpt: Not a coder? Don't understand DAX syntax? DAX can be intimidating and difficult to learn. Frustrating even! Learning DAX can make Power BI very rewarding. value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Marco Russo, from SQL BI, joins Patrick to look at how you can debug DAX using variables in Power BI. value.title: Dynamic labels in Power BI using DAX

value.title: Generate Year and Month Combinations in Power BI Report using DAX
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.title: Get the Day of the Week Name and Number in Power BI Using DAX
